body:
This is a resubmit of #1671 without the changes to the gcc specs file. This patches the makefile for libgcc_s.1.dylib on Darwin so that the absolute path is replaced by @rpath. 

Note: It was the changes to the specs file that caused #1671 to be reverted when it broke later gcc builds.
title: This changes the library ID of libgcc_s.1.dylib from an absolute path to @rpath/libgcc_s.1.dylib allowing it to be relocated
